title: Land for Sale in Kelaniya (Biyagama Road)
details:
Very good Residential area
Peaceful and tranquil surrounding, Good Neighborhood
Land extent - 65 perches beautiful land with a house (land value only)
Land at Biyagama Road. 2 kilo meters from the temple. 50 meters from Biyagama road.
Coconut, Mango, Banana trees add value to the garden
8 lacks a perch negotiable.

Please call for more information
Pan Global Property Developers (Pvt) Ltd
